delete.summary: Delete an person involved from the touchpoint.
delete.description: The Cobra.ServiceExtensions.Api.CobraApiResponse`1 object contains the StatusCode, the state, and an more detailed error message (optional)

parameters.name: peopleId
parameters.description: The Id of the involved Person

400.description: returns if the request violates a validation rule.

403.description: returns if you do not have the required permissions.

404.description: returns if no Touchpoint or person could be found with this Id.
